Precision design, made for people.


I'm a multifaceted designer with a passion for both digital innovation and traditional craftsmanship, based in Hamburg. With 4+ years of agency experience and a profound education in Media and Communication Design, I have cultivated my skills in digital, identity-related, and handcrafted design solutions. I believe in the power of design to change things for the better, following user-centric and empathetic approaches.
